params.amount: The amount of tokens to claim.
params.proof: The Merkle proof to verify the claim.
params.tokenIds: The IDs of the items to check.

returns._0: True if the user is eligible to claim, false otherwise.

params.amount: The amounts of the items to claim.
params.proof: The Merkle proof to verify the claim.
params.tokenIds: The ID of the token to claim.

params._amounts: The amounts of the tokens to deposit.
params._tokenIds: The IDs of the tokens to deposit.

params._merkleRoot: The Merkle root of the airdrop.
params._timeForClaim: The time until which claims are allowed.

params._amountsToRecover: The amounts of the tokens to recover.
params._tokenIdsToRecover: The IDs of the tokens to recover.

airdropChecker(uint256[],uint256[],bytes.notice: Checks if the user is eligible to claim an NFT based on a Merkle proof.

claim(uint256[],uint256[],bytes32[]).notice: Allows a user to claim an NFT based on a Merkle proof.

deposit(uint256[],uint256[]).notice: Allows the owner to deposit NFTs into the contract.

getInitData(address,address,bytes32,uint.notice: Returns the ABI-encoded initialization data for the contract.

recoverUnclaimed(uint256[],uint256[]).notice: Allows the owner to recover unclaimed NFTs after the claim period has expired.
